text: Nde Guma Bakɨme kaŋgi, ana fhum Isreriŋ ndigim, mbe Idzɨp thav vegi. Ana zumgum, guigira ana khothɨgi fhuv gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben farfagi. Gu khueŋ vuzvugiap taagia nde ndɨkndɨgi khavi, nde taagi ne ndɨkndɨgɨrga. 1.5Mbe Grikar kaman khergi gavi vuri mbari, mbe khaŋ nzuai Guma Bakɨme. Mbe maaŋ nzuai fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara. Mbe khaŋ mbui kherar ana muuŋgi, “Zisas.”
